options.text: Why would I tell you that?
Why would I tell you that?

dialog.text: Uh, I'm called Roswell. Please identify yourselves.

options.text: Why would I tell you that?

dialog.text: How did you get here? People don't come here very often.
That doesn't bode well. How about you come with me?

options.text: I'd rather not. Let's see what you are made of.

dialog.text: We are going to put you in the jail for now. Just in the office room until Sheriff Issac gets back.

options.text: I'd rather not. Let's see what you are made of.
